name: Covid-19 Tracking
detail: Covid-19 tracking with cases number, chart, news, map and basic information.

name: JavaScript Quiz
detail: A quiz about JavaScript, written in JavaScript. This app features a countdown timer and highscore tracker.

name: Password Generator
detail: Simple password generation application. It builds a password of a specified length using your choice of character types.

name: Team Builder
detail: This application allows the user to build a team of managers, engineers and interns from the command line.

name: Note Taker
detail: Enables user to write, save and edit notes. This application is deployed on Heroku.

name: Day Planner
detail: Day planner application that dynamically changes formatting based on the time of day.
